title: Awesome List Updates on Aug 07, 2024
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Aug 07, 2024 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### GraphQL / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [apollo-angular (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/kamilkisiela/apollo-angular) - A fully-featured, production ready caching GraphQL client for Angular and every GraphQL server.
*   [buoy (⭐7)](https://github.com/buoy-graphql/buoy) - A GraphQL client for Angular built on top of Apollo.
*   [graphql-code-generator (⭐11k)](https://github.com/dotansimha/graphql-code-generator) - A tool for generating code based on a GraphQL schema and GraphQL operations (query/mutation/subscription), with flexible support for custom plugins.
*   [hasura (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/hasura/learn-graphql) - Real world GraphQL tutorials for frontend developers with deadlines!
*   [tailcall](https://tailcall.run/blog/graphql-angular-client/) - This comprehensive guide dives into five powerful approaches for integrating GraphQL into your Angular applications.
items.content_html:
GraphQL / Google Developer Experts

  • apollo-angular (⭐1.5k) - A fully-featured, production ready caching GraphQL client for Angular and every GraphQL server.
  • buoy (⭐7) - A GraphQL client for Angular built on top of Apollo.
  • graphql-code-generator (⭐11k) - A tool for generating code based on a GraphQL schema and GraphQL operations (query/mutation/subscription), with flexible support for custom plugins.
  • hasura (⭐1.2k) - Real world GraphQL tutorials for frontend developers with deadlines!
  • tailcall - This comprehensive guide dives into five powerful approaches for integrating GraphQL into your Angular applications.

items.title: Awesome Circuitpython
items.content_text:
### Code / Educational

*   [Tod Kurt's CircuitPython `synthio` Tips and Tricks (⭐83)](https://github.com/todbot/circuitpython-synthio-tricks) - More tips and tricks from Tod Kurt about CircuitPython's `synthio` library.

### Podcasts / Educational

*   [The Bootloader](https://thebootloader.net) - hosted by CircuitPython community members Paul Cutler and Tod Kurt, this podcast often covers CircuitPython topics.

### Talks / Educational

*   [Connecting Old to New with CircuitPython: Retrocomputer input devices on modern PCs](https://youtu.be/XhwI8ZHhbE8) - Jeff Epler at PyCon 2024
items.content_html:
Code / Educational

  • Tod Kurt's CircuitPython synthio Tips and Tricks (⭐83) - More tips and tricks from Tod Kurt about CircuitPython's synthio library.

Podcasts / Educational

  • The Bootloader - hosted by CircuitPython community members Paul Cutler and Tod Kurt, this podcast often covers CircuitPython topics.

Talks / Educational

  • Connecting Old to New with CircuitPython: Retrocomputer input devices on modern PCs - Jeff Epler at PyCon 2024

items.title: Awesome Browser Extensions for Github
items.content_text: ### [GitHub vscode-icons (⭐338)](https://github.com/dderevjanik/github-vscode-icons) Show [vscode-icons (⭐4.7k)](https://github.com/vscode-icons/vscode-icons) in the repository browser. Installs: 2000 | Stars: 309 | Last update: n/a
items.content_html:
GitHub vscode-icons (⭐338)

Show vscode-icons (⭐4.7k) in the repository browser.

Installs: 2000 | Stars: 309 | Last update: n/a

items.title: Awesome Godot
items.content_text:
### Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

*   [Dialogue Engine (⭐231)](https://github.com/Rubonnek/dialogue-engine) - Minimalistic dialogue engine that fits into your GUI nodes and automatically graphs the branching dialogues for easy debugging.
items.content_html:
Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • Dialogue Engine (⭐231) - Minimalistic dialogue engine that fits into your GUI nodes and automatically graphs the branching dialogues for easy debugging.

items.title: Awesome Zig
items.content_text:
### Web / Messaging

*   [zon-dev/zinc (⭐114)](https://github.com/zon-dev/zinc) - Zinc is a framework focusing on high performance, usability, security, and extensibility.
items.content_html:
Web / Messaging

  • zon-dev/zinc (⭐114) - Zinc is a framework focusing on high performance, usability, security, and extensibility.

items.title: Awesome Perl
items.content_text:
### Data Format / DSP

*   [CBOR::Free](https://metacpan.org/pod/CBOR::Free) - Support for [CBOR](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7049), IETF’s “binary JSON”
items.content_html:
Data Format / DSP

  • CBOR::Free - Support for CBOR, IETF’s “binary JSON”

items.title: Awesome Elixir
items.content_text:
### Data Visualization

*   [plox (⭐95)](https://github.com/gridpoint-com/plox) - Server-side rendered SVG graphing components for Phoenix and LiveView.

### Macros

*   [typed\_structor (⭐17)](https://github.com/elixir-typed-structor/typed_structor) - A library for defining structs with types effortlessly.

### ORM and Datamapping

*   [ecto\_watch (⭐241)](https://github.com/cheerfulstoic/ecto_watch) - Allows you to easily get notifications about database changes directly from PostgreSQL.
items.content_html:
Data Visualization

  • plox (⭐95) - Server-side rendered SVG graphing components for Phoenix and LiveView.

Macros

  • typed_structor (⭐17) - A library for defining structs with types effortlessly.

ORM and Datamapping

  • ecto_watch (⭐241) - Allows you to easily get notifications about database changes directly from PostgreSQL.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### (requires Neovim 0.5)

*   [rachartier/tiny-code-action.nvim (⭐364)](https://github.com/rachartier/tiny-code-action.nvim) - Provides a simple way to run and visualize code actions with Telescope.

### Quickfix / Diagnostics

*   [stevearc/quicker.nvim (⭐693)](https://github.com/stevearc/quicker.nvim) - Improved quickfix UI and editable quickfix buffer.

### Preconfigured Configuration / Diagnostics

*   [dam9000/kickstart-modular.nvim (⭐798)](https://github.com/dam9000/kickstart-modular.nvim) - This is a fork of nvim-lua/kickstart.nvim that moves from a single file to a multi file configuration.
items.content_html:
(requires Neovim 0.5)

  • rachartier/tiny-code-action.nvim (⭐364) - Provides a simple way to run and visualize code actions with Telescope.

Quickfix / Diagnostics

  • stevearc/quicker.nvim (⭐693) - Improved quickfix UI and editable quickfix buffer.

Preconfigured Configuration / Diagnostics

  • dam9000/kickstart-modular.nvim (⭐798) - This is a fork of nvim-lua/kickstart.nvim that moves from a single file to a multi file configuration.

items.title: Awesome Microservices
items.content_html:
Rust / Scala

  • Wtx (⭐302) - HTTP/2 client/server framework.
